title: Algeria: Weak Hydrocarbon Revenue, High Spending Widen Fiscal Deficit
description:
Algeria: Weak Hydrocarbon Revenue, High Spending Widen Fiscal Deficit

Weak hydrocarbon revenue and increased public spending widened Algeria’s fiscal deficit, the Executive Board of the International Monetary Fund (IMF) highlighted at the conclusion of the Article IV Consultation.

title: Algerian President Holds Regular Interview with National Press
description:
ALGIERS, Sept 26, 2025 – Algerian President Abdelmadjid Tebboune held his regular media Interview with representatives of the national press, which will be broadcast this Friday evening on national television and radio channels at 21:00 local time (20:00 GMT).

title: Wheat Futures Rebound As US Planting Lags And Algeria Buys Big
description:
Wheat prices picked up after earlier declines, with slow US planting and a major Algerian purchase providing fresh momentum.

What’s going on here?

title: Russia-Algeria Bilateral Relations: September 2025 Update
description:
The Russian Foreign Minister, Sergey Lavrov, met with Mohamed Attaf, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Algeria, on the sidelines of the 80th Session of the UN General Assembly in New York.
